attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The rising cost of fuel in uk is increaing driver small hauliers out of business. The average tank of fuel for a wagon cost more than £1000 a week with around £500 going to the treasury that is more than a days average bep of around £450. This cost is pussing up haulage chargesand as a result increasing price on the uk shop shelfs and driving inflation hauliers are unable to shallow such costy and require support. 
We propose in lines with what fuel protester are suggesting a reduction in fuel duty for the uk road hauliers

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
